data.name: messageSession
data.value: Your work session, is about to expire, by incativity

data.name: titleSesion
data.value: Your Session is About to Expire!

data.name: zoom
data.value: Slide the mouse over the image and move the center button to see details

data.name: renglones_copiado
data.value: Copied lines and Available to paste

data.name: subtitleComment
data.value: Use this tool to clarify details about the measures with your team

data.name: cambioReporte
data.value: has made modifications to this report, we recommend that you save your captures and continue working

data.name: errorAjax
data.value: An error has occurred while performing this action, please try again or reload the portal!

data.name: descripcionMensaje
data.value: We invite you to download the PDF file of the portal, where you can observe in a more global way the different areas and roles involved during the portal process, which will help you understand the importance of your work

data.name: tituloMensaje
data.value: Learn about the complete process of the portal

data.name: guardando
data.value: The record is being saved ... a moment

data.name: borrado
data.value: The record has been removed from this report

data.name: confirm_delete_register
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this register?

data.name: adjuntos
data.value: Here the system allows us to optionally upload PDF files, which supports the measures and progress recorded

data.name: aprobadaGeologia
data.value: If you consider that the Geology data is already correct, you can use this button to check all the boxes at once, or the same to disapprove them

data.name: aprobadaGeologia1
data.value: If we consider that the Geology data is already correctly captured you must check this box for approval, in this way Geologia I can no longer make changes in this place

data.name: aprobarCaptura
data.value:
You are welcome! to the step by step guide for the module of APPROVAL TOPOGRAPHY .

your role is that of APPROVAL, your objective is to review the captures displayed in the table that the surveyors made and if they are correct, check the topography column

data.name: aprobarGeologia
data.value:
Welcome to the step by step guide for APPROVAL GEOLOGY , which will help you understand your process.

Your role is that of CHIEF OF GEOLOGY, your task is to validate or approve in the corresponding fields for each of the places where you work, the amount of Mineral, amount of tepetate as well as the Silver and Gold Laws for this date range

data.name: autorizaTopografia
data.value: If you consider that the topography data is already correct, you can use this button to check all the boxes at once, or the same to disapprove them

data.name: autorizaTopografia1
data.value: If we consider that the topography data is already correctly captured you must check this box for approval, in this way topography I can no longer make changes in this place

data.name: capturaMedida
data.value:
Welcome to the step-by-step guide for the module CAPTURE MEASUREMENT TOPOGRAPHY , which will help you understand your process.

Your role is that of TOPOGRAFO, your goal is to capture the corresponding data for each of the places for this date range

data.name: chkGeologia
data.value: If this column is checked, this place was already approved by the head of Geology and you can not make changes in this place, on the contrary, if it is not checked, the boss is waiting for you to capture the information corresponding to this place

data.name: cMineral
data.value: Use this column to capture the amount of actual Mineral obtained for each of the places

data.name: cTepetate
data.value: Use this column to capture the amount of real Tepetate obtained for each of the places

data.name: eliminarEncabezado
data.value: In this option you have the option to delete the report that you have created, use it with caution.

data.name: encabezado
data.value: In this part you will find the general data of the current report, name, measurement date and backup attachments

data.name: fechaMedicion
data.value: Date in which topography raised topographic measurement in mine

data.name: grid
data.value: In this section the system displays a concentrate of all the places that had activities or shots based on the registration of people

data.name: guardarEncabezado
data.value: Once you finish capturing the corresponding information for each of the places, you must save the report

data.name: intro
data.value:
Welcome to the step-by-step guide for the CAPTURE GEOLOGY module, which helps you understand your process.

Your role is that of GEOLOGY, your task is to capture in the corresponding fields for each of the places where you work, the amount of Mineral, amount of time as the Silver and Gold Laws for this date range

data.name: lnkView
data.value: Use this column to send or receive comments to your team and clarify details regarding a specific PLACE of measurement

data.name: lnkView_eliminar
data.value: Here you can delete the selected place, if you do not want it to appear in this topographical measure

data.name: lOro
data.value: Use this column to capture the actual Gold Law obtained for each of the places

data.name: lPlata
data.value: Use this column to capture the actual Silver Law obtained for each of the places

data.name: M3
data.value: Assign the cubic meters obtained in this place if it is the case

data.name: ML
data.value: Assign the linear meters for this place if it is a development

data.name: nombreReporte
data.value: In this field is the name of the report, which is formed by the words ReportTopography, the name of contractor or union and finally the initial and final report range

data.name: reales
data.value: Use this column to assign a REAL section WIDTH and HIGH obtained in the field

data.name: regenerar
data.value: If some places do not appear in the report locations, you can use this option to regenerate this report and the missing places will be included.

data.name: tempoAutoriza
data.value: If this column is checked, this place is approved by the chief of topography and changes can not be made in this place, on the other hand, if it is not checked, the chief of surveying is waiting to capture the information that corresponds to this place

data.name: toneladas
data.value: Capture the tons obtained in this place and for the date range, if it was obtained

data.name: tools
data.value: Export the report to PDF or Excel format when you need it

data.name: visualizaColumnas
data.value: Tool to activate or deactivate columns in the table for a better visualization

data.name: confirm_remove_register
data.value: Are you sure to remove this place from the topographical measurement?

data.name: descartado
data.value: The place has been ruled out of this topographical measure

data.name: registroDescartado
data.value: has removed a place from this topographical measure, we recommend you record and update

data.name: registroRemovido
data.value: The place has been removed from the topographic measurement

data.name: enPlan
data.value: Does the place where you work belong to the WORK PLAN CONTEXT or do you work in another place?

data.name: mtsBarrenados
data.value: Total meters drilled according to the total length of holes
